pageContext.course_type_long_description: Gear up your engineering skills with Play-Well TEKnologies and tens of thousands of LEGO®! Learn to build mechanical devices such as a scissor lifts, drawbridges, and create a Mini Golf Course. Then design and build within constraints to come up with innovative answers for challenges such as Follow the Hose and Thread the Needle. Are you ready for the Engineering Challenge?
